thread.title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
thread.title_full: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy

author: Tribune wire reports
title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
text:
John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy Chrissy Teigen, John Legend J Pat Carter / AP 
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend announced on their Instagram accounts, Monday, Oct. 12, that they are expecting their first child. 
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend announced on their Instagram accounts, Monday, Oct. 12, that they are expecting their first child. (J Pat Carter / AP) Tribune wire reports Contact Reporter 
John Legend and Chrissy Teigen are expecting their first child. 
The 36-year-old musician and 29-year-old model announced the pregnancy Monday on Instagram. A spokeswoman for Teigen confirmed the social media post. 
Legend and Teigen revealed the news by posting a black-and-white photo of themselves with the caption: "We're pregnant!" Teigen wrote that conceiving a child hasn't been easy for the pair and that they are looking forward to growing their family. 
The "All of Me" singer-songwriter and "FABlife" co-host have been married since 2013. 
Associated Press
